*The 43 billion Swiss Francs OASI deficit from 2021 to 2030 raises concerns, but could the approval of the Tax Reform and AHV Financing on May 19, 2019 be successful?*

The @ofasbsvfsio_hintergrunddokumnent_2019 prepared this fact sheet, which was published on the [website of the Federal Department of Finance (FDF)](https://www.efd.admin.ch/efd/en/home/the-fdf/legislation/votes/tax-reform-ahv-financing/staf-bsv.html) on February 19, 2019. It demonstrates the assumptions used to calculate the budget.

Together with the mathematicians from the [FSIO](https://www.bsv.admin.ch/bsv/en/home.html), I contributed to this document by modeling and producing the various variants of the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance (OASI) financial budget in R.

These variants are featured on the last pages of the document.
